title: The Authority may permit the floor space indices specified in these regulations to be exceeded to th
clause_text: The Authority may permit the floor space indices specified in these regulations to be exceeded to the extent of 100% over and above the permissible basicFSI for biotechnology units / parks subject to following conditions :-
section: Additional FSI to Biotechnology Units / Park

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
